captions.text:
My name is Ralf Ekdahl.
Welcome to my road cruiser.
Volvo FH16 - 700 BHP.
4.5 metres high.
24 metres long.
This is the optimal space.

We've kept the design clean and simple,
without too much bling-bling.

I like it. I've always been
really passionate about trucks.

This is all very new to me
and a bit different.

When I'm out driving on the roads,
I'm basically a danger to other drivers.

They almost drive off the road
when they're driving next to me.

They can't believe their eyes.
I like that.
Metal panelling...
A glass cube made of water-cut glass.

That truck is the same one
that's on the right side of this truck.

These storage cupboards
are controlled by this remote.

We have a bar. Nothing but Ramlösa
mineral water, I'm afraid.

Mahogany... We have an aquarium
that you can look at.
It's nice to look at in the evenings.

This remote
controls basically everything.

Don't you want to hear
what it sounds like?

That's all from me and my road cruiser.
�

title: Volvo Trucks - Ralf Ekdahls Road cruiser a true prize-winner - "Welcome to my cab"
